overview: Dr. Carole Heisler is dead and buried. But when The Ghost of Garganta rises from the grave she quickly wreaks havoc. With the aid of an alien menace known as Solopticus, Garganta will stop at nothing to take her revenge upon those who put her in the grave.
tagline: Hell hath no fury like a giant woman scorned!
title: The Ghost of Garganta
